snippet: Cabinet ministers have agreed to pursue changes that relax foreign ownership restrictions that impede the airline’s ability to raise capital.
abstract: Australian government rejects a request from Qantas Airways for an unsecured loan to help the carrier return to profitability; cabinet ministers agree to pursue changes that relax foreign ownership restrictions that impede the airline’s ability to raise capital
lead_paragraph: Cabinet ministers have agreed to pursue changes that relax foreign ownership restrictions that impede the airline’s ability to raise capital.

headline.main: Australia Rejects Loan Deal for Struggling Qantas Airways
headline.print_headline: Australia Rejects Loan Deal for Struggling Qantas Airways
